characters: Driver of a white truck, person on a motorcycle
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving in an industrial area. A white truck is seen moving from the right side towards the center of the road, potentially cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. A person on a motorcycle is also present, moving from the left side towards the center of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the movements of the white truck and the motorcycle. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate or stop to avoid a collision with the truck that is moving into its lane.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white truck, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the center of the road, potentially cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Left side: A person on a motorcycle, approximately 15 meters away, moving towards the center of the road.
